name: MetaFist
description:
Weapons at the ready! It’s time to take on the biggest challenge of your existence in MetaFist.

In MetaFist, you’re an awesome android superhero with metal tools for hands. Use them to battle your enemies, tackle obstacles, and complete in-game challenges to beat the levels. Tackle bosses, walls, enemies and more in this amazingly fun adventure game.

FEATURES:
- Lots of levels to play
- Easy to get to grips with, fun to play
- The best half-human, half-weapon game out there
